name: Chang the Ninth
title: Chang the Ninth, Listless Literati
desc: "He who has not known poverty has yet to become a true man, and at least this man has books to keep him company!"

skills.desc:
After either side uses a Skill: If Physical DMG or Piercing DMG was dealt, or an Elemental Reaction was triggered, this card gains 1 Inspiration.
When this card gains 3 Inspiration, discard this card, then draw 2 cards.
